title: Report: Kenyan Parliament Committee Approves Bill Proposing to Widen Definition of Securities to Include Crypto
description: A Kenyan parliamentary committee has reportedly approved a bill that proposes to widen the definition of securities to include cryptocurrencies. The bill proposes a tax on crypto exchanges and digital wallets as well as a capital gains tax on users who realize a capital gain from the sale of their crypto assets. Bill Just Two […]

title: John Deaton raises alarm over SEC’s possible Bitcoin security tag
description: In recent developments, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) approach towards Bitcoin has sparked debate and worry among cryptocurrency enthusiasts and legal experts. Attorney John Deaton, a prominent figure in the crypto legal landscape, has voiced his concerns regarding the possibility of Bitcoin being classified as a security by the SEC. This discussion gains ... Read more

title: Polygon Ventures Head of Finance joins KEY Difference
description: In the cryptocurrency industry, shifts within leadership ranks signal more than just career moves; they hint at the undercurrents of change and potential within the sector. The latest such move is Derek Albanese‘s, former head of finance at Polygon Ventures. Albanese, with a keen eye for innovation and a seasoned history in private equity and ... Read more

title: PlanB forecasts Bitcoin bull run, eyes $100K target in 2023-2024 based on stock-to-flow modelling
description: Crypto analyst PlanB predicts Bitcoin entering a bull market, potentially reaching over $100,000 in 2023-2024 based on technical indicators and his stock-to-flow model.

title: FTT rising as Bitcoin hits $41k, new crypto AI project could dominate 2024

title: BTC’s Dominance Drops, but Alt Season May Still Be Months Away
description:
The cryptocurrency trader and analyst Dan Gambardello revealed in an X post earlier today that Bitcoin’s (BTC) dominance is dropping. According to the post, this may open up the potential for altcoins to rally before the upcoming halving event estimated to take place in April. In his analysis, Gambardello mentioned that BTC’s dominance reaching between […]
